page.title: 05HOME LIFE
page.content: About 57 people live in the village itself:others inhabit the farms around.Most people have their own cars so there is no bus service apart from the school bus twice each day.Shopping is done at Tiverton(6 miles away) where market day is on a Teusday or in Exeter the neares Cathedral town(12 miles away).People have their television sets and videos or enjoy visiting the pub for their entertainment.The Cadeleigh Arms provides opportunities for playing skittles or darts or just drinking and talking.
